title: WallSync
description:
The WallSync Capture app accurately transforms your handwritten notes into digital notes. No typing required and it's done in seconds not hours.

How it works

1. Simply capture your physical notes using your camera in the app

2. The app converts your handwriting to digital text

3. Edit and organise your notes as you see fit

4. Export your digital notes to a Trello, Jira or Google Sheets
